headline: Raytheon UK to Supply GPS Anti-Jamming Solutions for International Armoured Vehicle Programme
summary: Raytheon UK, part of RTX's (NYSE: RTX) Raytheon business, has been awarded a contract from BAE Systems to supply its Landshield Plus anti-jam antennas for the CV90 infantry fighting vehicle.

headline: A Look at Raytheon (RTX) Valuation Following $205 Million U.S. Navy Defense Contract Win
summary: RTX (RTX) has just landed a $205 million contract with the U.S. Navy for continued work on the Phalanx Close-In Weapon System, a defensive technology that has already saved lives and proven itself in real-world conflicts. The contract covers not just production but also crucial upgrades and overhauls. This further cements RTX's reputation as a reliable defense partner with unique capabilities. For investors, this deal is more than just a headline. It is a reminder of RTX’s role at the heart...
